name: The Best Clam Sauce
author: Jodie B
summary: I cannot order better white clam sauce in a restaurant. My boyfriend begs me to make this!  Thanks Mom! Serve this dish with fresh garlic bread and a nice white wine. I promise this is a keeper and you won't like any other white clam sauce!
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, add linguini and return water to a boil
Let linguini cook until al dente; drain well
In a large skillet, saute the onion and garlic in olive oil until the onions are translucent
Drain the cans of minced clams, reserving half of the juice
Stir the clams, reserved juice, butter, salt and pepper, and wine
Simmer the mixture for 20 minutes, until the sauce has reduced 1/3 and has thickened
Spoon the clam sauce over the linguini and serve
